name: Unearthing Colossal
description: Take on the role of an epic titan of death named Reaper. Your nemesis the Bringer of Life has broken from tradition - the cycles of life - and created a sentient race known as the Humans. Now it's up to you as Reaper to complete the cleansing cycles of life and death.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32/64bit) Processor: 2GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: X1950 Pro, 7900 GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Tried playing this game and spent around 10 minutes at the 3rd puzzle as the text didnt appear. Then when it says to double hit d to dash it dosent work...... Needs work.
